changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS WebContent ( id INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT UNIQUE PRIMARY KEY, layoutSetId INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE, content VARCHAR(4096) NOT NULL, createDate TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CONSTRAINT fk_lsid_layoutset_id FOREIGN KEY (layoutSetId) REFERENCES LayoutSet (id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE) ENGINE = InnoDB, CHARACTER SET = utf8, COLLATE = utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Group_ ( id INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT UNIQUE PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL UNIQUE, userGroup TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 ) ENGINE = InnoDB, CHARACTER SET = utf8, COLLATE = utf8_unicode_ci;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS UserGroup ( userId INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, groupId INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_ug_userId_user_id FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES User (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_ug_groupId_group_id FOREIGN KEY (groupId) REFERENCES Group_ (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT uq_usergroup_uid_gid UNIQUE uq_usergroup_uid_gid (userId, groupId) ) ENGINE = InnoDB, CHARACTER SET = utf8, COLLATE = utf8_unicode_ci;
